fields.name: viewLabel
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewStart" or .eventName == "viewStop" then .attributes.viewLabel else null end

fields.name: viewClass
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewStart" or .eventName == "viewStop" then .attributes.viewClass else null end

fields.name: viewId
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewStart" or .eventName == "viewStop" then .attributes.viewId else null end

fields.name: productId
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewProduct" or .eventName == "addToWishList" or.eventName == "removeFromWishList" or .eventName == "addToCart" or .eventName == "removeFromCart" then .attributes.id else null end

fields.name: productName
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewProduct" or .eventName == "addToWishList" or.eventName == "removeFromWishList" or .eventName == "addToCart" or .eventName == "removeFromCart" then .attributes.name else null end

fields.name: productDescr
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewProduct" or .eventName == "addToWishList" or.eventName == "removeFromWishList" or .eventName == "addToCart" or .eventName == "removeFromCart" then .attributes.description else null end

fields.name: brand
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewProduct" or .eventName == "addToWishList" or.eventName == "removeFromWishList" or .eventName == "addToCart" or .eventName == "removeFromCart" then .attributes.brand else null end

fields.name: quantity
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewProduct" or .eventName == "addToWishList" or.eventName == "removeFromWishList" or .eventName == "addToCart" or .eventName == "removeFromCart" or .eventName == "startCheckout" or .eventName == "purchase" then .attributes.quantity else null end

fields.name: price
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewProduct" or .eventName == "addToWishList" or.eventName == "removeFromWishList" or .eventName == "addToCart" or .eventName == "removeFromCart" then .attributes.price else null end

fields.name: variant
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewProduct" or .eventName == "addToWishList" or.eventName == "removeFromWishList" or .eventName == "addToCart" or .eventName == "removeFromCart" then .attributes.variant else null end

fields.name: category
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewProduct" or .eventName == "addToWishList" or.eventName == "removeFromWishList" or .eventName == "addToCart" or .eventName == "removeFromCart" or .eventName == "viewCategory" then .attributes.category else null end

fields.name: currency
fields.expr: if .eventName == "viewProduct" or .eventName == "addToWishList" or.eventName == "removeFromWishList" or .eventName == "addToCart" or .eventName == "removeFromCart" or .eventName == "startCheckout" or .eventName == "purchase" then .attributes.currency else null end

fields.name: value
fields.expr: if .eventName == "startCheckout" or .eventName == "purchase" then .attributes.value else null end

fields.name: purchaseErrorCode
fields.expr: if .eventName == "purchase" and .attributes.errorCode != null then .attributes.errorCode else null end

fields.name: purchaseErrorMessage
fields.expr: if .eventName == "purchase" and .attributes.errorMessage != null then .attributes.errorMessage else null end

fields.name: custAttrKey1
fields.expr: if (.attributes != null) and (.attributes | keys | .[0]) and (.eventName as $event | ["viewStart","viewStop","clientSessionStart","clientSessionStop","purchase","viewProduct","viewCategory","search","clearCart","addToWishList","removeFromWishList","startCheckout","addToCart","removeFromCart"] | index($event) == null) then .attributes | keys | .[0] else null end
